text: (aur nahin sunate) aur ham hee ne moosa ko bhee kitaab (taurait) ata kee thee to usamen bhee isamen ekhtelaaph kiya gaya aur agar tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se ek baat pahale na ho chukee hotee to unamen kab ka phaisala kar diya gaya hota, aur ye log aise shaq mein pade hue hain jisane unhen bechain kar diya hai
